Generates an R script with the examples from an Rd file.

Source: R/functions.R
generate_script_from_help.Rd

Generates an R script with the examples from an Rd file.

Usage

generate_script_from_help(path_to_rd)

Arguments

path_to_rd

String. Path to Rd file you wish to convert to a script

Value

Side-effect. No returned object, writes a script on disk.

Details

This function is a wrapper around `tools::Rd2ex()` tht extracts the examples from Rd files included in the man/ folder of source packages and writes them to disk, next to the Rd files.

Examples

get_archived_sources("AER")
#> # A tibble: 25 × 5
